name.description: The unique name for the issue type. The maximum length is 60 characters.

description.description: The description of the issue type.

type.description:
Deprecated. Use `hierarchyLevel` instead.

Whether the issue type is `subtype` or `standard`. Defaults to `standard`.

hierarchyLevel.description:
The hierarchy level of the issue type. Use:

 *  `-1` for Subtask.
 *  `0` for Base.

Defaults to `0`.
